t:
We found a underwater cave where the fish could grant wishes.
First we wished for more wishes,
                 then for better lifestyle,
                 then for more money,
                 then for faster cars,
                 then for taller buildings.

By the time we thought to use our wishes to stop drastic climate change, global warming or water pollution,
                      there were no fishes left.
c:
I kill people in my stories, the heat is killing me.

The fishes died of pollution and global warming, while we kept fulfilling our unnecessary wishes.



#fish #wish #want #pollution #climatechange #globalwarming #fakeness #death
